title: How AI’s biggest loser turned into the hottest stock in the world
description: It’s not that long ago that Alphabet was being derided as the big technology firm most vulnerable to the artificial intelligence revolution. How things change.
content:
Macquarie strategist Viktor Shvets has a theory about the speed with which sharemarket winners and losers can emerge in a world where abundant capital has become fused with incredible technology.

title: NetApp beats quarterly estimates on robust data storage demand
description: NetApp beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its data storage services and all-flash storage products used in artificial intelligence applications.
content:
The company's shares rose 3% in extended trading after it also raised its annual profit forecast.

title: AI platform Suno unveils deal with Warner Music Group
description: The US artificial intelligence platform Suno and Warner Music Group have announced a partnership to compensate recording artists in the fast-growing domain of AI music.
content:
The US artificial intelligence platform Suno and Warner Music Group have announced a partnership to compensate recording artists in the fast-growing domain of AI music.

title: 'Guaranteed Human': Audio giant iHeartMedia says real people, not AI personalities, are at the controls
description: Radio station DJs now are expected to say "Guaranteed Human," as part of their hourly on-air disclosures. The move comes amid fears about the use of artificial intelligence.
content:
As media executives wrestle with the use of artificial intelligence, radio giant iHeartMedia wants to stand out.
“We don’t use AI-generated personalities. We don’t play AI music that features synthetic vocalists pretending to be human,” Tom Poleman, ... [4040 chars]

title: Fact File: X's AI chatbot claims Carney isn't PM, Russian video set in Toronto
description: The artificial intelligence chatbot Grok made several errors over the past few weeks when asked to verify information on the X platform.
content: The artificial intelligence chatbot Grok made several errors over the past few weeks when asked to verify information on the X platform. In one instance, it miscaptioned video of a 2021 altercation involving hospital workers in Russia as taking place... [5418 chars]

title: Japan firms turn to satellites, AI to find abandoned houses for sale
description: Dozens of Japanese companies are capitalizing on a combination of satellite imagery and artificial intelligence to help them find abandoned houses that could be put up for sale, as the graying country copes with a rise in deserted housing.
